word:
MR No. 841 - Ellen White's Deep Conviction of Her Prophetic Call

     [Requested for publication in the Adventist Review. Most of Letter 86, 1906, has been released before and may be found in Manuscript Releases 213, 295, and in This Day With God, p. 76. The paragraphs below are the only parts of Letter 86, 1906, not previously released.]
